New Records: Wanindu Hasaranga ruled out of the remainder of the series due to a hamstring injury
Key Match Events: Shubman Gill c Kamindu Mendis b Jeffrey Vandersay 35(44)
Jeffrey Vandersay takes his sixth wicket of the match and KL Rahul is the latest one to fall!
Jeffrey Vandersay has a five-wicket haul and he is taking apart the Indian batting all by himself!
Jeffrey Vandersay is turning around the game here for Sri Lanka as he traps Virat Kohli lbw!
Pre-Game Insights: India Captain Rohit Sharma Looks To Break Multiple Batting Records During 2nd ODI Against Sri Lanka.
Wanindu Hasaranga Ruled Out of Remainder of India vs Sri Lanka ODI Series Due to Hamstring Injury, Jeffrey Vandersay Named Replacement
Post-Match Reflections: India would need to look into their batting and come up with a much-improved performance in the third ODI if they are to level the series.
Charith Asalanka's inspired bowling effort once again gives Sri Lanka a 1-0 lead in the series
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bowlers, especially spinners dominated the game-play dictating the pace and outcome of the match with some decisive wickets.
Sri Lanka managed to defend the 231-run target in a dominated era.
Dunith Wellalage, who scored 67 runs topping all the batters in the match, will look to provide a similar output at the very venue
Others: Jeffrey Vandersay's six-wicket haul gives Sri Lanka a 32-run win over India in the second ODI.
Sri Lanka are now 1-0 up in the series.
